name: Car Factory (itch)
description:
You have to react, really really fast to slide the cars to its colored production line.

Take this opportunity to show-off your quick reaction.

-----------------------

On this mechanical adventure you can compete with your friends to see who scores more points!

The quicker you react the more points you will get!

-----------------------

Features:

  • Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
  • A game of dexterity and skill
  • Ultra mechanical graphics and sounds
  • Many fast and intense levels
  • Lots of bonus to unlock
  • Levels more and more hard to beat
  • Leaderboard with friends and rivals

    • -----------------------
